text: The Crossing Guard is an independent 1995 American drama movie. Jack Nicholson plays Freddy. Anjelica Huston plays Mary. They are a divorced couple whose daughter was killed by a drunk driver. When Freddy finds out that the man who killed his daughter has been released from prison, he decides to kill him. This movie was released in November 1995. It got very positive marks from the critics. == Other websites == * Category:1995 movies Category:2000s drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:American independent movies
title: The Crossing Guard
